events.message: The candidate submitted their application for the software engineer position through our careers portal, highlighting relevant experience in backend development and cloud technologies.
After reviewing the application details, the recruitment team categorized the candidate under the engineering cluster focusing on software developer roles.
A recruiter specializing in software engineering positions was assigned to handle this candidateâ€™s case to ensure domain-specific queries are well addressed.
The recruiter conducted an initial screening call focusing on technical skills, previous projects, and alignment with our engineering team's needs.
The candidate responded promptly with enthusiasm to proceed further in the recruitment process and shared additional details regarding their devops experience.
A technical interview was scheduled with the lead software developer to assess coding skills and problem-solving ability in the upcoming week.
